item.title: VIM Cheat Sheet
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: Multiple Files Buffers Command Info :e file edit a file in a new buffer :bn or :bnext go to the next buffer :bp or :bprev go to the previous buffer :b4 go to buffer number 4 :bf go to first buffer :bl go to last buffer :b foo<TAB> go to buffer foo (with tab completion) :bd delete a buffer (close a file) :ls or :buffers list all open buffers set hidden hide buffers when abandoned :sb switch to a buffer you already opened :sb and :b can take partial names and globs e.
